Config.name: ROOTSetup
Config.Param: rawData pulses The branches to read in options are - events - rawData - pulses - accumWaveform - all - none
pulses accumWaveform events The branches to read in options are - events - rawData - pulses - accumWaveform - all - none

Config.name: PMTMapSetup
Config.Param: default The PMT mapping file to read in. If default is passed the files in $CCMINSTALL/mappings/mapping_master* will be used Must be the first param in this config
default List of the HV channels that are off. default is $CCMINSTALL/mappings/hv_off_2019.csv
default Name of the calibration file to use

Config.name: CCMBuildAccumWaveform
Config.Param: STROBE Only look at triggers with name passed. Options are: - BEAM - STROBE - LED - ALL and any combination of the three, like BEAM STROBE

CCMAccumWaveformTriangle CCMAccumWaveformTrianglePulseCut The build methods to use. Options are: CCMAccumWaveformTriangle CCMAccumWaveformTrianglePulseCut CCMAccumWaveformStart CCMAccumWaveformStartPulseCut
-9920 The earliest in the DAQ window to allow the pulse to start in ns Only needed if BuildMethod contains at least one PulseCut
-250 The latest in the DAQ window to allow the pulse to start in ns Only needed if BuildMethod contains at least one PulseCut

Config.name: CCMFindEvents
Config.Param: 0.2 The PE threshold for a 2ns bin to trigger event building
1 Flag to reset the Events class. Should only be used in the first instance of CCMFindEvents
CCMAccumWaveformTriangle Which CCMAccumWaveformMethod to use in finding the events
CCMDynamicLengthEvent Which CCMEvnetFinderID to use in finding the events options: CCMDynamicLengthEvent CCMFixedLengthEvent
0 Number of bins for the required length of the event only needed if EventFinderID == CCMFixedLengthEvent

Config.name: CCMFindEvents
Config.Param: 0.2 The PE threshold for a 2ns bin to trigger event building
0 Flag to reset the Events class. Should only be used in the first instance of CCMFindEvents
CCMAccumWaveformTrianglePulseCut Which CCMAccumWaveformMethod to use in finding the events
CCMDynamicLengthEvent Which CCMEvnetFinderID to use in finding the events options: CCMDynamicLengthEvent CCMFixedLengthEvent
0 Number of bins for the required length of the event only needed if EventFinderID == CCMFixedLengthEvent

Config.name: CCMSumWaveforms
Config.Param: STROBE Only look at triggers with name passed. Options are: - BEAM - STROBE - LED - ALL and any combination of the three, like BEAM STROBE
1 If true apply the time offset between FP3 and CCM
0 Flag to reject events based off the BCM cut
